snippet: Daniel Descalso, the second baseman for the St. Louis Cardinals, returned to the Bay Area and shared the spotlight with his sister, who was playing in a soccer tournament.
abstract: St Louis Cardinals second baseman Daniel Descalso returns to the Bay Area, where he was born and raised, for National League championship series against San Francisco Giants.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Descalso, the second baseman for the St. Louis Cardinals, returned to the Bay Area and shared the spotlight with his sister, who was playing in a soccer tournament.

headline.seo: Cardinals’ Descalso and His Little Sister Get Equal Cheers From Parents
headline.main: A Cardinal’s Parents Cheer Equally for His Little Sister
headline.print_headline: A Cardinal’s Parents Cheer Equally for His Little Sister
